theorem entrywise_sup_norm_bound_of_unitary {U : matrix n n ğ•œ} (hU : U âˆˆ matrix.unitary_group n ğ•œ) : Â«exprâ€– â€–Â» U â‰¤ 1 :=

theorem entry_norm_bound_of_unitary {U : matrix n n ğ•œ} (hU : U âˆˆ matrix.unitary_group n ğ•œ) (i j : n) :
    Â«exprâ€– â€–Â» (U i j) â‰¤ 1 :=
  by
  -- The norm squared of an entry is at most the L2 norm of its row.
  have norm_sum :
    Â«exprâ€– â€–Â» (U i j) ^ 2 â‰¤
      finset.sum_univ "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ"
        (Â«exprâ€– â€–Â» (U i x) ^ 2) :=
    by
    apply multiset.single_le_sum
    Â· intro x h_x
      rw [Multiset.mem_map] at h_x
      cases' h_x with a h_a
      rw [â† h_a.2]
      apply sq_nonneg
    Â· rw [Multiset.mem_map]
      use j
      simp only [eq_self_iff_true, finset.mem_univ_val, and_self_iff, sq_eq_sq]
  -- The L2 norm of a row is a diagonal entry of U â¬ Uá´´
  have diag_eq_norm_sum :
    (matrix.mul U (matrix.conj_transpose U)) i i =
      finset.sum_univ "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ"
        (Â«exprâ€– â€–Â» (U i x) ^ 2) :=
    by
    simp only [matrix.mul_apply, matrix.conj_transpose_apply, â† starRingEnd_apply, is_R_or_C.mul_conj,
      is_R_or_C.norm_sq_eq_def', is_R_or_C.of_real_pow]
  -- The L2 norm of a row is a diagonal entry of U â¬ Uá´´, real part
  have re_diag_eq_norm_sum :
    is_R_or_C.re ((matrix.mul U (matrix.conj_transpose U)) i i) =
      finset.sum_univ "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ"
        (Â«exprâ€– â€–Â» (U i x) ^ 2) :=
    by
    rw [is_R_or_C.ext_iff] at diag_eq_norm_sum
    rw [diag_eq_norm_sum.1]
    norm_cast
  -- Since U is unitary, the diagonal entries of U â¬ Uá´´ are all 1
  have mul_eq_one : matrix.mul U (matrix.conj_transpose U) = 1 := unitary.mul_star_self_of_mem hU
  have diag_eq_one : is_R_or_C.re ((matrix.mul U (matrix.conj_transpose U)) i i) = 1 := by
    simp only [mul_eq_one, eq_self_iff_true, matrix.one_apply_eq, is_R_or_C.one_re]
  -- Putting it all together
  rw [â† sq_le_one_iff (norm_nonneg (U i j)), â† diag_eq_one, re_diag_eq_norm_sum]
  exact norm_sum
#align entry_norm_bound_of_unitary entry_norm_bound_of_unitary
